page.title: 17Amenities of the Village
page.content: Today we went round the roads of Mattersey looking for amenities. On Main Street we found the Piano Shop, the Blacksmiths Arms, a bus stop, street lights, Council garages and Mattersey All Saints Playgroup at the old school. On Priory Close there were street lights, a mobile shop. On Job Lane opposite Priory Close there was the old Chapel. After that we went to Retford Road, there were street lighting, Mattersey Hall, an electricity sub station, Mattersey Chapel, a telephone box, the church, the Barley Mow and its car park. There is also a Post Office, a letter box and a litter bin. On Abbey Lane there was a farm shop, a rectory, a water hydrant and the rectory. On Church Lane there was a water hydrant, footbridge, river, campsite and a rustic seat and litter bin.
